# Cultural Orientation in Poland – Workshop – Welcome Point

URL: https://wtp.agh.edu.pl/cultural-orientation-in-poland-workshop/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:24:12

Welcome Point
 > 
NAWA & Welcome to Poland 2.0
 > 
Cultural Orientation in Poland – Workshop

Cultural Orientation in Poland – Workshop

Attention international students, PhD candidates, and academics at AGH University! We are thrilled to announce the 
first edition
 of our workshop 
“Cultural Orientation in Poland”
, designed to help you navigate and embrace life in Poland with confidence and ease.

This unique event will take place
 online
 on the platform 
MS Teams
 on 
27 February 2025
 and is aimed at building cultural awareness, fostering connections, and equipping participants with practical knowledge about Polish customs, academic culture, and everyday life.

Key Details:

Date:

February 27, 2025

Location:
 online – 
MS Teams

Language:
 Sessions will be conducted 
in English

Cost:
 Free of charge

How to Join?

Registrate by filling up this form: 
https://forms.office.com/e/Cnmid0XFWS

After registration, you will be sent details of the event and the documents to submit.

Why attend?

✅ Understand Polish Culture
:
 Discover the traditions, values, and societal norms that shape life in Poland.
✅ Navigate Academic Life
:
 Learn how to thrive within AGH University’s academic environment.
✅ Build Connections
:
 Network with fellow international students, faculty members, and local experts.
